photo.description: Receiving vault in relation to the completed Lincoln Tomb.
photo.tags: abrahamlincoln springfield lincolnstomb
photo.title: Receiving Vault

photo.description: Receiving vault for Mr. Lincoln. After his assassination on April 14, 1865 in Ford's Theater in Washington, D.C., the president's body traveled a circuitous route before reaching Springfield. He was laid to rest on May 4, 1865 in this temporary location before being moved to his "final" location. In all, his coffin was moved 17 times before he was placed in his final resting place.
photo.tags: abrahamlincoln springfield lincolnstomb
photo.title: Receiving Vault
